question: You have been working as a Manager in a private company for the last two years with no salary raise. Write a letter to your manager to request a pay equity in your salary as compared to other managers in your department.In your letter,explain why you are writingwhy you think you deserve a salary raisesay what you want your manager to do for you
text: I am writing this letter to express a concern regarding my compensation. It's been more than two years since I do not have any appreciation for my salary despite huge profits and company share values  skyrocketing and I am not sure how long should I work without any hike in my pay.

I strongly believe that  I am the best employee in our project, In addition, I am also extending my support to other teams as well during their critical situations. Apart from that, the last two projects which I developed huge got  phenomenal feedback from our clients. Furthermore, I have also received the best appreciation email from our CEO desk for my immaculate quality work.

As you heard, I am not at all happy with my current salary and the benefits which I am getting from our company.Hence, I would request you to please have a look into my case immediately and it would be great if you could send a note human resource team on my salary increment. If I did not get any response from the HR team and then, I would look at a new opportunity for sure as I cannot work for less package.
I look forward to hearing a response from you with good news. I hope it will come soon to make me feel happy.
